Mailbox Force Unlock

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x20
Size:
0x4

Description

Capability for uC only to force unlock the mailbox.
Caliptra Access: RW
SOC Access: RO

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:1] - - - -
[0] unlock rw 0x0 -
